page.title: 15CIRENCESTER GOLF CLUB.
page.content: Cirencester Golf Club is situated 4 kms from the centre of Cirencester on the Cheltenham Road.The club used to be at Sapperton but membership increased so the club moved to its present home. The course covers 185 acres and has 18 holes . There are 80 bunkers on the course and by the 9th hole there is a pond. The Gloucestershire County Championships were held there in 1984. There are 600 members altogether. Juniors are aged between 12-18, their membership costs Â£48 per year there are only 3 girls. There are 80 lady members, they pay Â£110,male are members aged between 21-55, it costs them Â£141 per year. When they reach 55 they become a senior. The 1985 club champion is David Carroll,he is also the County Champion
